jcr:content.awardName3: Connecticut Elks Association Gold Award Scholarship
jcr:content.awardReq1: Girl Scout Gold Award recipient (and all requested documentation) Accepted at a college or technical school and entering as a Freshman
jcr:content.awardReq2: Registered Girl Scout in Connecticut Girl Scout Gold Award recipient (and all requested documentation) Accepted to a college May be an incoming Freshman, or if completed Gold Award after April 1st of High School, may be entering Sophomore year in college
jcr:content.awardReq3: Registered Girl Scout in Connecticut Girl Scout Gold Award recipient (and all requested documentation) Active in school or community Attending a college
